mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homeworkfiles (homeworkfile_id, homeworkfile_name, homeworkfile_size, homeworkfile_location, download_location, homeworkfile_ext, homework_id ) VALUES (homeworkfile_id_seq.nextval, #{homeworkfileName}, #{homeworkfileSize}, #{homeworkfileLocation}, #{downloadLocation}, #{homeworkfileExt}, #{homeworkId} )

INSERT INTO replyfiles (replyfile_id, replyfile_name, replyfile_size, replyfile_location, download_location, replyfile_ext, reply_id) VALUES (replyfile_id_seq.nextval, #{replyfileName}, #{replyfileSize}, #{replyfileLocation}, #{downloadLocation}, #{replyfileExt}, #{replyId} )
mapper.select: SELECT homeworkfile_id, homeworkfile_name, homeworkfile_size, homeworkfile_location, download_location, homeworkfile_ext, homework_id FROM homeworkfiles WHERE homework_id= #{homeworkId}
SELECT homeworkfile_id, homeworkfile_name, homeworkfile_size, homeworkfile_location, download_location, homeworkfile_ext, homeworkfile_id FROM homeworkfiles WHERE homeworkfile_id = #{#homeworkfileId}
SELECT replyfile_id, replyfile_name, replyfile_size, replyfile_location, download_location, replyfile_ext, reply_id FROM replyfiles WHERE reply_id= #{replyId}
